entries.name: Age
entries: Golems are constructed and do not age as mortals do.

entries.name: Subrace Choice
entries: Choose Inorganic Golem or Organic Golem.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Knowledge Programmed
entries: You are proficient in any combination of three skills or tools of your choice.

entries.name: Machine's Mastery
entries: Choose one trait such as climb speed, darkvision 60 ft, burrow, swim speed, or increased walking speed as designed with your DM.

entries.name: Golem's Muscle
entries: You count as one size larger when determining carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Nature's Knowledge
entries: You are proficient in the Nature skill.

entries.name: Natural Weapon
entries: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 + your Strength modifier. You are proficient with these unarmed strikes.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: You are immune to disease, do not need to eat, drink, or breathe, and instead of sleeping you enter an inactive state for 4 hours per day during which you are aware of your surroundings.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: When unarmored, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + 1.
